original: Andersson, Georg Gustav, konstnär, Norrköping, f. 19/2/00 i Sthlm av Helmer A. o. Gerda Jonsson. G. m. Maja Eriksson. Barn: Marie-Louise f. 34. — Stud. v. Ebersteinska sk. i Norrköp. Stud:res. t. Norge 32 o. Danm. 34. Huv:sakl. figurmåln. o. stilleben samt landskapsmåln. m. motiv fr. Norrl., östergötl. o. västkusten. Delt. i Sv:es allm. konstfören. utställn. sed. flera år. Hobbies: fiske o. musik.
translated: Andersson, Georg Gustav, artist, Norrköping, born February 19, 1900 in Stockholm to Helmer A. and Gerda Jonsson. Married to Maja Eriksson. Children: Marie-Louise born in 1934. Studied at the Ebersteinska School in Norrköping. Studied abroad in Norway in 1932 and Denmark in 1934. Mainly focused on figurative painting, still life, and landscape with motifs from northern, east and west coasts. Participated in the general art exhibition of Sweden for several years. Hobbies include fishing and music.

structured.name: Georg Gustav Andersson
structured.description: Mainly focused on figurative painting, still life, and landscape with motifs from northern, east and west coasts. Participated in the general art exhibition of Sweden for several years.
